intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce their insurance costs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their current insurance is expensive or are exploring new options.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's expertise in financial planning and cost-saving strategies.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and examples.

intents.sub_intent: understanding key insurance terms and rules
intents.user_motivation: Users want to decode complex insurance jargon to make informed decisions.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are new to insurance or want clarity on specific terms.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's reputation for simplifying financial concepts.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Glossary-style content with examples and FAQs.

intents.sub_intent: mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
intents.user_motivation: Users want to avoid costly errors in their insurance dealings.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are about to purchase insurance or file a claim.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Showcase ING's customer-centric approach and trustworthiness.

intents.sub_intent: choosing the best insurance plan for specific needs
intents.user_motivation: Users want to compare and select the most suitable insurance plan.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they are ready to purchase insurance but need guidance.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's European expertise and digital tools for personalized recommendations.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Interactive comparison tool or decision tree.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING can emphasize its digital tools and financial expertise to help users save money.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create a comprehensive guide with actionable tips, common mistakes, and ING's unique solutions.

sub_intents: understanding key insurance terms and rules
choosing the best insurance plan for specific needs
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Simplify complex insurance concepts and offer personalized recommendations through ING's digital platform.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop educational content with glossaries, FAQs, and interactive tools to guide users.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums
understanding key insurance terms and rules
mistakes to avoid when dealing with insurance
quick_wins: Create a listicle on saving money on insurance.
Develop a glossary of key insurance terms.
Publish a guide on common insurance mistakes.
